report.title: Tranquil Euphoria
report.author: Jake
report.bodytext: I had read about kava kava smoked by some people so I decided to do some first hand investigating. /n /n I went to an herb store in my city and bought about 2 ounces of fresh Kava Kava (none of the emptying the pills, drinking tea shit) for 6 bucks. Pretty cheap! /n /n T+ 00:00 /n I packed the first bowl and smoked it in a few minutes, it burns almost as good as tobacco. /n /n T+ 00:05 /n Mild effects, but not much. Packed the second bowl and smoked it. /n /n T+ 00:09 /n Effects settling in very nicely. It's surprisingly stronger than I expected from the reports, but nice. /n /n T+ 00:15 /n I've reached full effects, it's similar to being stoned, but relatively aware. Everything is moving a little bit slower, and I'm really, really relaxed. Definately something to use after a hard day. /n /n It's T+ 00:35 now and I still feel all the effects, I now love Kava Kava. And the best part is... it's LEGAL. Don't listen to thoughs who say there is no effects. /n /n It is an awesome, tranquil euphoria. If you go in to it expecting very little, you will come out with an awesome experience.
